page.title: 17NATIONAL NEWS
page.content: {GAS LEAK One of the main items in the news recently was the gas leak at Hinckley Leisure Centre in September 1984. It was caused as new chemicals were being delivered.The driver connected the wrong chemical to the wrong tank. Chlorine gas was produced and gas found its way to the swimmming pools. Thirty of the children who were having a swimming lesson and the manager Mr. Collins were taken to Nuneaton Hospital in a fleet of ambulances. No-one was seriously hurt. Since the gas leak further precautions have been taken to ensure that it cannot happen again.
